Here's one more, harbinger=3Da warning? Like harbinger of bad times? Weird=
 why they would say that? Are they saying not to believe the predictive voi=
ces?
 
 Frank-S 


To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.comFrom: franks-boxes@...=
mDate: Fri, 12 Oct 2007 10:39:53 -0600Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Spur of the mo=
net session



Yeah, it probably just depends on conditions. #3 was kinda i=
ffy, and made out of noise. Here's another. I just now went out to Field El=
emenary to check a locate request. A locate request is to notify us that so=
meone is digging somewhere in Littleton, and I have to verify that it will =
not hit any of our burried fiber. This was far enough away to not 'bother' =
Field's fiber. Mostly I like to put these up cuz it shows you need nothing =
but simple equipment, just an AM radio, and I used the built in recorder, s=
o not even recording from the speaker! It's so friggin' close to proof, but=
 just can't quite get it there! Frustrates me to no end.  Frank-S


To: evp=
-itc@yahoogroups.comFrom: paranormalinvestigating@...: Fri, 12 =
Oct 2007 12:10:17 -0400Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Spur of the monet session


F=
rank, I hear 1, 2 and 4 as you do very clearly but can't make out more than=
 'want'in #3. I had really good sucess with the manual sweeps also if you r=
emember the posts. Bruce

Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team 


T=
o: evp-itc@yahoogroups.comFrom: franks-boxes@...: Fri, 12 Oct 2=
007 09:57:22 -0600Subject: [EVP-ITC] Spur of the monet session


I was chec=
king out a little boom box here, and decided to do a quickie session using =
manual sweep of the AM band. This is at work(don't tell the boss!).  The on=
e about the male dog might refer to the mate to this female poodle we have =
now. For those unfamilar, our daughter in-law knows someone that rescues do=
gs, and she was tryuing to get rid of some of her too many animals. The dau=
ghter in-law at first gave us the male poodle a few weeks ago, but he was d=
eaf, blind, and someone, probably the puppy mill he came from, pulled all h=
is teeth. He was too much to deal with, he fell down our stairs twice, and =
we felt he was suffereing too much, so we took him to the Dumb Friends Leag=
ue. Now we have his mate, but she has most of her teeth, and can hear, see =
and is a little sweetie. #4 is hopefully accurate.   Frank-S
